Name: Trenches of War
About the game: Trenches of War is a fast-paced World War I-inspired strategy game. Battle through the Alps by spawning units and capturing trenches, barracks, and factories. Cross rivers that rise when it rains. Use or destroy bridges and cornfields that may aid or deter your maneuvers. Strategically spawn 9 units including infantry, snipers, tanks, artillery, planes, and engineers Conquer 125 hand-crafted battlefields Capture buildings and powerful weapons Build bridges, trenches, and structures with the engineer Face off against a variety of AI personalities
